definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Availability 0f recovering and reusing culture liquid of Spirulina plantensis is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 探討了對鈍頂螺旋藻培養液進行回收再利用的可行性。

sentences.english: And quality caproic acid bacteria was obtained through tests of temperature resistant , alcohol resistant , pH resistant , and anaerobic culture.
sentences.chinese: 己酸菌是一種能夠在培養液中積累己酸的功能菌。

sentences.english: However, few people keep cell-culture medium handy at home or in school.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在家裏或學校裏很少人手邊有細胞培養液。

sentences.english: An antibacterial protein was extracted from tea fungus culture.
sentences.chinese: 從紅茶菌培養液中提取出抗菌蛋白。

sentences.english: The mice in the blank control group were infused with isovolume serum-free culture medium.
sentences.chinese: 空白對照組輸注等量無血清培養液。
